sub_title: Research Intern | MSc Student of Geo-Information Science at Wageningen
summary: I obtained my first degree in my passion Geology; focusing on GIS, Earth Observation and Hydrogeology. Next, I rushed to finish the 12-month compulsory military service in various units in the Hellenic Navy. Afterwards, I moved to the Netherlands to continue my studies. Here I am in my final year of MSc in Geo-Information Science. Currently, I am finalizing my thesis and looking for an internship related to GIS and Earth Observation.
